---
title: "Introduction Event for Interested Students"
date: 2025-05-06
---

On Mai 06, 2025, we hosted a kickoff event for all students who are interested in joining BEARS. 

![Our first speaker Matti Keller talking about the club](img/kick_off_sose_matti.jpg){width=60%}

Every project shortly introduced themself and students had the chance to ask questions. We served free fries and drinks.s
The event took place at 18:00 in room F11 (ground floor) in the [RFT building](https://maps.app.goo.gl/sixUKMx4wxruqQFr8).

![Thanks everybody for joining!](img/kick_off_sose_general.jpg){width=80%}
